name: ClostridiumDifficileTest
title: Clostridium Difficile Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: List of tests that can detect C. Diff),(Data Element Scope: This valueset is intended to work with the data element type, Laboratory Test),(Inclusion Criteria: Search terms included: clostridium +difficil* -diffusion -resistant -ADL -resident -difficulty),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
